attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am pretty upset that I have to ride down many busy roads to get to a bridleway. Any that do so happen to be on quieter country roads are not Bridleways but footpaths. I think, that with all respect to farmers, around half the footpaths should be turned into Permissive Bridleways at least. All pedestrians can walk on Bridleways but horses not on footpaths. Many people have this problem and would like it to be corrected.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
